scripts.ssl: cd cpp_modules/openssl && ./config shared --prefix=`pwd`/openssl --openssldir=`pwd`/openssl/openssl && make && make install
scripts.urlcpp: cd cpp_modules/urlcpp && mkdir -p test && yarn install && make -f Makefile all
scripts.build: cd test && pwd && mkdir -p build/src/parsing && mkdir -p build/src/constitution && mkdir -p build/src/density && mkdir -p build/src/lattice && mkdir -p build/src/reading/tcp && mkdir -p build/src/publishing/jgf && which make && make -j 3 -f Makefile all
